attributes.action: Make it a Constitutional Requirement that Prime Ministers should be Elected, even when one Retires or Dies in mid-term.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of the most important points about democracy is that people are governed by those who they consent to govern them. However, under current methods, it is perfectly conceivable that someone could govern for up to five years without the peoples' consent. THAT WOULD MEAN THAT THE PM COULD BE APPOINTED, NOT ELECTED.
Sign this petition in order to secure a constitutional requirement that the Prime Minister is elected, and governs with the support of the people.
